sentences.english: Place on a prepared tray, brush the tops lightly with egg.
sentences.chinese: 放在鋪好烤紙的烤盤上，刷上蛋液入預熱烤箱。

sentences.english: We fix it, pierce in several places and put into the oven.
sentences.chinese: 將塑料袋封好，然後在上面搓幾處小孔，放入烤箱。

sentences.english: The baked apples are spluttering in the oven.
sentences.chinese: 這些烤蘋果在烤箱內劈里啪啦地響。

sentences.english: King pawed the door again, and Gallagher understood in a flash.
sentences.chinese: “國王”又在用爪子抓扯烤箱的門了。

sentences.english: High volume, twin cabinet electric rotisseries with programmable controls.
sentences.chinese: 大容量，程控式兩櫃旋轉烤箱。

sentences.english: Apartamentos Zafiro include a complete kitchen with electric oven and fridge.
sentences.chinese: 客房內還有帶電烤箱和冰箱的廚房。

sentences.english: The oven was made of a roughly built cube of fire-bricks.
sentences.chinese: 烤箱是用做工粗糙的近似立方形的耐火磚做的。

sentences.english: The date paste is wrapped in the dough and baked in a pan in the oven.
sentences.chinese: 把棗泥醬包在麪糰裏，然後用烤盤放進烤箱烤。

sentences.english: Spread batter into prepared tin and bake for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把麪糊倒入烘盤裏，鋪平，盛入烤箱烘約30分鐘。

sentences.english: Bake them in the middle of the oven.
sentences.chinese: 放置在烤箱中間的那格。

sentences.english: Eric: And even if you did cook, we don't have an oven.
sentences.chinese: 就算你會做，我們家連個烤箱都沒有。

sentences.english: This was placed next to the oven and hob for easy access.
sentences.chinese: 這在容易進入的烤箱和滾刀旁邊被安置了。

sentences.english: The cooking time is only 5 minutes in a 232-degree oven.
sentences.chinese: 在攝氏232度的烤箱內只需5分鐘便可大功告成了。

sentences.english: Cook the pie for 20 minutes in a pre-heated oven.
sentences.chinese: 在經過預熱的烤箱裏烘烤餡餅20分鐘。

sentences.english: While the cupcakes are cooking, make the frosting.
sentences.chinese: 當蛋糕還在烤箱中烘焙時，製作糖霜。
